verses.verse: To the chief Musician, <S%H5329><s%> A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> of David. <S%H1732><s%> In thee, O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> do I put my trust; <S%H2620><s%> let me never <S%H408><s%> <S%H5769><s%> be ashamed: <S%H954><s%> deliver <S%H6403><s%> me in thy righteousness. <S%H6666><s%>

Bow down <S%H5186><s%> thine ear <S%H241><s%> to <S%H413><s%> me; deliver <S%H5337><s%> me speedily: <S%H4120><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> thou my strong <S%H4581><s%> rock, <S%H6697><s%> for a house <S%H1004><s%> of defense <S%H4686><s%> to save <S%H3467><s%> me.

For <S%H3588><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> art my rock <S%H5553><s%> and my fortress; <S%H4686><s%> therefore for thy name's sake <S%H4616><s%> <S%H8034><s%> lead <S%H5148><s%> me, and guide <S%H5095><s%> me.
Pull me out <S%H3318><s%> of the net <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7568><s%> that <S%H2098><s%> they have laid privily <S%H2934><s%> for me: for <S%H3588><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> art my strength. <S%H4581><s%>
Into thine hand <S%H3027><s%> I commit <S%H6485><s%> my spirit: <S%H7307><s%> thou hast redeemed <S%H6299><s%> me, O LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H410><s%> of truth. <S%H571><s%>
I have hated <S%H8130><s%> them that regard <S%H8104><s%> lying <S%H7723><s%> vanities: <S%H1892><s%> but I <S%H589><s%> trust <S%H982><s%> in <S%H413><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

I will be glad <S%H1523><s%> and rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in thy mercy: <S%H2617><s%> for <S%H834><s%> thou hast considered <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> my trouble; <S%H6040><s%> thou hast known <S%H3045><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> in adversities; <S%H6869><s%>
And hast not <S%H3808><s%> shut me up <S%H5462><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the enemy: <S%H341><s%> thou hast set <S%H5975><s%> my feet <S%H7272><s%> in a large room. <S%H4800><s%>

Have mercy <S%H2603><s%> upon me, O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I am in trouble: <S%H6862><s%> mine eye <S%H5869><s%> is consumed <S%H6244><s%> with grief, <S%H3708><s%> yea, my soul <S%H5315><s%> and my belly. <S%H990><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> my life <S%H2416><s%> is spent <S%H3615><s%> with grief, <S%H3015><s%> and my years <S%H8141><s%> with sighing: <S%H585><s%> my strength <S%H3581><s%> faileth <S%H3782><s%> because of mine iniquity, <S%H5771><s%> and my bones <S%H6106><s%> are consumed. <S%H6244><s%>

I was <S%H1961><s%> a reproach <S%H2781><s%> among all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> mine enemies, <S%H6887><s%> but especially <S%H3966><s%> among my neighbors, <S%H7934><s%> and a fear <S%H6343><s%> to mine acquaintance: <S%H3045><s%> they that did see <S%H7200><s%> me without <S%H2351><s%> fled <S%H5074><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> me.
I am forgotten <S%H7911><s%> as a dead man <S%H4191><s%> out of mind: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3820><s%> I am <S%H1961><s%> like a broken <S%H6><s%> vessel. <S%H3627><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> I have heard <S%H8085><s%> the slander <S%H1681><s%> of many: <S%H7227><s%> fear <S%H4032><s%> was on every side: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5439><s%> while they took counsel <S%H3245><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> me, they devised <S%H2161><s%> to take away <S%H3947><s%> my life. <S%H5315><s%>
But I <S%H589><s%> trusted <S%H982><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> thee, O LORD: <S%H3068><s%> I said, <S%H559><s%> Thou <S%H859><s%> art my God. <S%H430><s%>

My times <S%H6256><s%> are in thy hand: <S%H3027><s%> deliver <S%H5337><s%> me from the hand <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> of mine enemies, <S%H341><s%> and from them that persecute <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7291><s%> me.
Make thy face <S%H6440><s%> to shine <S%H215><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> thy servant: <S%H5650><s%> save <S%H3467><s%> me for thy mercies' <S%H2617><s%> sake.

Let me not <S%H408><s%> be ashamed, <S%H954><s%> O LORD; <S%H3068><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I have called upon <S%H7121><s%> thee: let the wicked <S%H7563><s%> be ashamed, <S%H954><s%> and let them be silent <S%H1826><s%> in the grave. <S%H7585><s%>

Let the lying <S%H8267><s%> lips <S%H8193><s%> be put to silence; <S%H481><s%> which speak <S%H1696><s%> grievous things <S%H6277><s%> proudly <S%H1346><s%> and contemptuously <S%H937><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the righteous. <S%H6662><s%>

Oh how <S%H4100><s%> great <S%H7227><s%> is thy goodness, <S%H2898><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thou hast laid up <S%H6845><s%> for them that fear <S%H3373><s%> thee; which thou hast wrought <S%H6466><s%> for them that trust <S%H2620><s%> in thee before <S%H5048><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men! <S%H120><s%>

Thou shalt hide <S%H5641><s%> them in the secret <S%H5643><s%> of thy presence <S%H6440><s%> from the pride <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7407><s%> of man: <S%H376><s%> thou shalt keep them secretly <S%H6845><s%> in a pavilion <S%H5521><s%> from the strife <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7379><s%> of tongues. <S%H3956><s%>
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> he hath showed me his marvelous kindness <S%H6381><s%> <S%H2617><s%> in a strong <S%H4692><s%> city. <S%H5892><s%>

For I <S%H589><s%> said <S%H559><s%> in my haste, <S%H2648><s%> I am cut off <S%H1629><s%> from before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5048><s%> thine eyes: <S%H5869><s%> nevertheless <S%H403><s%> thou heardest <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of my supplications <S%H8469><s%> when I cried <S%H7768><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> thee.

O love <S%H157><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> ye his saints: <S%H2623><s%> for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> preserveth <S%H5341><s%> the faithful, <S%H539><s%> and plentifully <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3499><s%> rewardeth <S%H7999><s%> the proud <S%H1346><s%> doer. <S%H6213><s%>
Be of good courage, <S%H2388><s%> and he shall strengthen <S%H553><s%> your heart, <S%H3824><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> ye that hope <S%H3176><s%> in the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
